transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello, haanji sir.
Executive: Uh, main Sumit Associate se bol raha hun.
Customer: Kahan se baat kar rahe ho sir aap?
Executive: Sumit Associates.
Customer: Ji ji ji sir.
Executive: Uh, uh, yeh mujhe na 10-15 din se lead hi nahi aa rahi hai aur aapka yeh bhi koi attend nahi kar raha hai. To kuch seriously thoda bahut socho, hello.
Customer: Kyunki we are paid for that one.
Executive: Achha, lead nahi aa rahi hai aapke paas?
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Achha, sir aapko maine apna number diya tha na, main Shruti baat kar rahi hun.
Customer: Haan Shruti, uh, uh, haan, main wait kar raha hun aapka, uske baad mein jab bhi aapka meeting hua uske baad mein aapka kuch bhi respond nahi aaya uske baad mein.
Executive: Sir actually kya hai na ki maine baat bhi kara tha Alok se, aapne bola tha na ki Alok ne aapko.
Customer: Sahi baat hai lekin mere ko kaise pata chalega?
Customer: Barabar na?
Executive: Sir uske baad kya tha na ki aaj hi humne wapas se kaam resume kiya, chhuttiyan chal rahi thi Diwali ko leke to hum log ghar pe hi hai. To abhi just office bhi open hua hai aaj, proper aaj se hi working hua hai.
Customer: Yeh baat sahi hai lekin aapko malum hai kya, jab bhi kuch renewal hai na to mujhe din mein char-char, panch-panch baar phone aate hai, renewal karao, renewal karao. Abhi 15-20 din ho gaye hai to, uh, ab hamara bhi kuch yeh mann hai na, thik hai?
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Yeh maine chal lena hai. 13 tarikh ko, 13 tarikh ko main aapse baat karke gayi hun proper ki sir yeh cheeze hai uske baad se chhuttiyan chal rahi thi aur aaj matlab first day hi working hai to main aaj hi office aayi hun.
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Aur already maine isko, sir aapne, isiliye isiliye isiliye nahi rehte na.
Executive: Sir main jahan se belong karti hun wahan mera matlab mera puja tha to main gayi bhi thi chhutti pe already.
Customer: Nahi tumhara to thik hai lekin aapke liye to baki company nahi ruk sakta na.
Executive: Sir kya hota hai na, I know I know sir lekin aapne mujhe beech mein kabhi phone hi nahi kiya matlab ek aad din ko main aapse baat karke gayi hun proper.
Customer: Nahi aapne bola ki main senior se baat karke aapko yeh karta hun karke bola to definitely mujhe to lag raha tha.
Executive: Sir maine baat kiya bhi already ki pharmaceutical aap machine ka hai.
Executive: Wahi to bol rahi hun sir ki maine already baat kiya hai even Alok ko bhi bola tha ki agar tumhare ko pehle se previous client hai to ek bari dekh address karne ke liye uske baad se chhuttiyan pad gayi is vajah se somehow connect nahi ho paya.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Hmm hmm. Okay. Uske baad sir abhi maine kaam apna resume kiya hai. Aap jo sir bata rahe ho na ki jaise aapki jo product line hai wo pharmaceutical mein deal karti hai right?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Hmm. Sir is category mein na sir kya hai ki hamare paas proper us particular category nahi hai aapke product line ke according jis jis category mein aapko kaam karte hai basically aap.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Jaise aap humne video meeting bhi discuss kiya tha sir already previous mein ki sir aap aap mujhe pehle to bata do ki kya product line hai. Maine dusri companies ka bhi socha ki ek bari unke catalog ko dekh ke bhi main ek bari koshish karti hun samajhne ka lekin all over India pe sirf aap hi ek kaam kar rahe ho aap.
Customer: Nahi Alok ko chhod ke dusre kisi se baat kar lo, dekho, uh, nahi aisa nahi hai, pehle business hota tha aap dusra koi hai unse baat kar lo, aisa nahi hai aap bol rahe hai na wo baat, uh, pehle wala dekh lo na history check karenge to pura pata chalega.
Executive: Sir main wo nahi bol rahi hun, main bol rahi hun sir jaise aap jis product line mein kaam karte ho na maine Google pe aur bhi company search ki hai, maine socha ki agar kuch category mujhe resemblance mein lagegi for sure, jisme aap bhi kaam karte honge aur same product line mein hoga to maine wo bhi search karne ka koshish kiya but wo koi specific sirf aap hi dikh rahe dikh rahe ho matlab agar aap Google pe search karoge na to Sumit Associate hi dikh raha hai ek particular company jis product line mein aap kaam kar rahe ho.
Customer: Angle to angle rahega na, yeh ek hi angle pakad ke nahi hoga na lekin mere ko, uh, uh, inquiry to kuch bhi generate nahi ho raha hai aap dekh lo na 10-15 din se.
Customer: Wahi hai.
Customer: Mera 4 lakh udhar ke udhar hi khada hai.
Customer: Aur aisa bhi nahi hai, uh, uh, kyunki, uh, uh, per day ka aap costing lete hai na, aisa thodi hai.
Customer: To kuch to hona chahiye na kaam.
Executive: Sir main, main usme kuch bol hi nahi rahi hun aapko, main bas yeh bol rahi hun ki jaise sir jis category mein hum log kaam karte hai na us matlab aapko bhi pehle se hi bataya tha maine ki sir category proper category jisme aap kaam karte ho wo category, uh, matlab hai hi nahi IndiaMART pe, right?
Executive: To is vajah se maine aapko bola ki main ek baar hum iske senior se baat.
Customer: Nahi nahi jo kuch hai aap zara mail kar do mere ko jo aap bol rahe hai na to uske upar hum yeh kare.
Customer: Nahi aap jo bol rahe hai na kaun se category mein nahi hai nahi to yeh hai wagera aap bol rahe hai na wo just mail kar do.
Executive: Main abhi iska main karti hun sir, abhi main apne senior se aapko call forward karati hun ek baar aap unko address kijiye, thik hai sir?
Customer: Nahi aap, aapko jo face kar rahe hai na, aap jo face kar rahe hai wo unse baat kar lo, kal chahe to main karta hun, mera abhi dusra meeting hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi sir aapne customer ke taraf se call kiya na sir to mujhe concern to close karna padega to abhi main yeh concern close kar du aur main senior se call milwaun aapko agar aap bolo to abhi nahi to aap jo bhi suitable time mujhe bataoge.
Customer: Uh, mujhe 4:30 baje tak call kar lo.
Executive: 4:30 baje tak, thik hai, main abhi, 4:30 na?
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Thik hai sir main yeh concern close karti hun, okay.
Customer: Okay, yeah.
Executive: Okay thik hai, thank you sir.
Customer: Yeah.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving buyleads for 10-15 days.

- No one is attending to the issue.



Resolution:

- Executive explained about Diwali holidays.

- Executive said the customer's product category is unavailable.

- Executive will forward the call to her senior.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will arrange a call by 4:30 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, product category, holidays, senior
